description:
What do you do when you oversleep, have a HUGE test, and start hallucinating? 

Complete tasks for others and yourself to make it through this crazy day. Follow the advise of your conscience to guide you through your adventures. Navigate the social traps of school while trying to make it to class on time. Will you get through this hectic day?

WASD or Arrow Keys - move

Shift - open task list

Z - interact

Assets by: 

https://itch.io/profile/rhysio

https://itch.io/profile/jan-schneider

https://materialfuture.itch.io/

https://itch.io/profile/chrismaltby

and me https://arc-games-1.itch.io/
